seed_pair.target: Why are you learning her name?

S0016: él quiere | volver | con todos los demás | más tarde | quiere volver
he wants | to to come back | with everyone else | later | wants to to come back
S0017: ella quiere | descubrir | cuál es la respuesta | quiere descubrir
she wants | to to find out | what the to answer is | wants to to find out
S0018: queremos | reunirnos | a las seis | esta noche | queremos reunirnos
we want | to meet | at six o'clock | this evening | we want to meet
S0019: pero | no quiero | parar de hablar | no quiero parar de hablar
but | I don't want | to stop talking | I don't want to stop talking
S0020: quieres | aprender | su nombre | rápidamente | quieres aprender | aprender su nombre
you want | to to learn | his name | quickly | you want to to learn | to to learn his name
